name: Absolution (David Tveraas)
description:
Absolution is a Vampire the Masquerade V5 game for Vampire Jam. Absolution a 3rd-Person RPG where you assume the role of one of three Vampires to track down the Prince of the City who has lost all their humanity and has become a mindless Wight. You will have to navigate society, Vampire Hunters, and the back-stabbing Kindred of the city to accomplish your goals. 

Dev Notes: 
I really wanted to get this out to showcase the amazing talent of my voice actors, writers, and other collaborators. They have all done a phenomenal job.

Fixed Bug: 
Main Menu no longer showing a blank white background, rather than rendering image. 
The clothes on several models now stay attached to the model's bodies.

Known Bugs: 
AI behavior irregularities. 

Thank you to everyone who plays Absolution, everyone who participated in the Jam, Outstar, Paradox Interactive, Dark Pack, The Storytellers Vault, and the World of Darkness. 

It is my dream to one day work on an official WoD or VtM video game. 

For business communications please contact me at david@occupationalhazardllc.com.
